body.p:
Frankfort Ky
To his Excellency
Governor Magoffin

The undersigned your petitioners would respectfully rpray the remission of fines amounting to $80. assessed by the Franklin Circuit Court against Joseph Pfeiffer for Selling liquor against the laws of the State, Your Excellency respited said fines Sometime in the month of May last and which are now well nighh run out They would further State that the Said Pfeiffer has quit the Sale of spiritous liquors and is now engaged trying to make an honest living upon a small farm in Anderson County.

Nelson Alley
Jas. P. O'Hara
T. Callaghan
P. U. Major
P. Joyce
Auh, P, Williams
Jos. Taylor
Jno. W Cason
John O'Connell
R. L. Cunningham
W. H. Greenup
G. G. Hearn
H R Crutcher

$20 } Selling Liquor
Jos. Pfeiffer
Issd Nov 19. 1861
